title: Brand New 2 Bed Townhouse in Highland Park | Pet-Friendly | W/D
posting_body: ['Unit Availability: September 5, 2022', '6417-6422 North Figueroa Street', 'Los Angeles, CA', '90042', 'Welcome to Fig & York where design-centric living is the focus.', 'Enjoy live/work loft-style units with high ceilings throughout.', 'Fig & York offers features such as covered gated parking, fully equipped gym, secure package locker room, central heat and air, in-unit washer and dryer, EV charging stations, outdoor courtyard, and much more!', 'While living at Fig & York, you will never go hungry.', 'We are blocks away from Amara Kitchen, Go Get Em Tiger, Triple Beam Pizza, Kitchen Mouse, and several more eateries that will keep your taste buds satisfied!', 'Located between Pasadena and Downtown LA, Highland Park is a short 15-minute drive in either direction.', 'Alternatively, the Metro stop is located a short walk away, making it convenient to be able to live car-free.', 'It would be our pleasure to show you our latest project.', 'Schedule your tour today.', 'Community Amenities:', '- Gated Package Locker Room', '- EV Charging Stations', '- High Walkscore', '- Outdoor Courtyard', '- Covered Gated Parking', '- Surveillance Camera Throughout', '- Fully Equipped Gym', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Recessed Lights', '- Generous Ceiling Heights Throughout', '- Stained and Polished Concrete Floors', '- Washer/Dryer in unit', '- Central Heat and Air', '- Balcony', '- Large Built-in Closets', 'Pet-Friendly:', 'Pets Welcome.', 'Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'For more information Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information visit: <URL>/', 'Square ft. is approximate.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Keyterms:', "Trader Joe's, Galco's, Colorado Blvd(Pasadena), The Colonnade, Shops At Main, Amara Kitchen, Go Get Em Tiger, Triple Beam Pizza, Kitchen Mouse, 110-Fwy, 134-Fwy, 210-Fwy, DownTown Pasadena, Dodger Stadium, HP Bowl, Highland Theatres, Garvanza Skatepark, La Cuevita, The Greyhound Bar&Grill, Yorkdale ES, Garvanza ES, Franklin HS, East LA College, PCC, USC, Pasadena, South Pasadena, Alhambra, Montecito Heights, Eagle Rock"]
